extendedInfo.description: StarLight Movement is a Live Wallpaper of the same name in 3D cube. You could play around with the movement with your fingers and adjust the speed and direction of rotation. Lighting and particle effects are added. Features include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.Contains Ads
